next_steps.note: "Brainstorm 5-10 potential themes or subjects for the poetry collection.",
"Write one complete poem (any length) based on one of the brainstormed themes. This serves as a 'seed' poem.",
"Research contemporary poets and poetry styles that resonate with the intended tone/subject matter of the project; identify 3-5 to study.",
"Create a list of 10-15 specific imagery or metaphor ideas related to the chosen theme(s).",
"Define the overall desired 'voice' or style for the poetry (e.g., lyrical, narrative, free verse, formal) - write a short paragraph describing it."
"Brainstorm 3 potential themes or subjects for the next set of poems, documenting ideas in the 'Ideas' list.",
"Draft the first draft of one poem based on the chosen theme, aiming for at least 10 lines.",
"Review the 'Ideas' list and prioritize the 9 pending next steps based on feasibility and impact.",
"Identify one specific poetic device (e.g., metaphor, alliteration) to focus on incorporating into the drafted poem.",
"Schedule 30 minutes for revision of the drafted poem, focusing on clarity, imagery, and the chosen poetic device."
